MAP.COMMENT: get matched event index in the events list

INVOKE.COMMENT: append event index to the eventIndices string list

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Implies some events have matched rule, hence take action

INVOKE.COMMENT: delete matched events from the events List

MAP.NAME: none
MAP.COMMENT: empty map step (no action needs to be performed)

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: update evaluation status of the matched events
